entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
